monster.name: Animatronic Horror
languages: Can not speak but their pilot can speak trough a speaker

trait.name: Pilot
entries: A small creature can crawl inside this machine and pilot it like a mech. They can not be harmed while inside this suit, but are ejected if the Animatronic Horror reaches 0 hit points/

trait.name: Mechanical Power
entries: The Animatronic Horror has advantage on any Strength checks to resist being {@condition grappled} or {@condition restrained}

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Animatronic Horror make 2 greatclub attacks

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) damage damage.
